org.jacorb.poa.gui

Interface POAMonitorView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    POAFrame

    public interface POAMonitorView
    Defines an interface of a POAManager monitor gui class.
    Version:
    1.00, 06/11/99, RT
    Author:
    Reimo Tiedemann, FU Berlin
